plugin.name: File Manager
plugin.author: Dan Hoover
plugin.description: Manage your ENTIRE server's files from this plugin, Use and enable with caution. Note that on windows the left side file tree may not work properly, but you can click on the path at the top and browse files quickly from the right side. Based entirely on the work of dulldusk at https://sourceforge.net/projects/phpfm/. Converted to a UserSpice plugin by Dan Hoover.
